titleStmt.title: Londons vvarning, by Ierusalem A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse on Mid-Lent Sunday last. By Francis White, Mr. of Arts, and sometime of Magdalene Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: White, Francis, b. 1588 or 9.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Purslowe, for Richard Flemming: and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the three Flower-de-Luces, in Saint Pauls Alley, neere Saint Gregories Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.
Title page mutilated; pages 9-10 stained. Beginning - page 25 from British Library copy spliced at end.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the three Flower-de-Luces, in Saint Pauls Alley, neere Saint Gregories Church
